Viola Shafik bụ onye Egypt-German na-eme ihe nkiri, onye nhazi, na onye na-eme fim.
A mụrụ Shafik na Schönaich, Baden-Württemberg, Germany nye nna onye Ijipt na nne onye Germany
Ọ gụrụ gbasara ọmụmụ Oriental na ọmụmụ German na Academy of Fine Arts
E mechara bipụta akwụkwọ edemede ya, Arab Cinema: History and Cultural Identity n'asụsụ Bekee n'afọ 1998

Ọ biri na New York na 1996 n'ihi onyinye sitere na Rockefeller Humanities Foundation.
Shafik akụziwo na Mahadum America dị na Cairo na Mahadụ Zürich Ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ maka ọzụzụ La Biennale di Venezia, al-Rawi Screenwriters Lab, na Dubai Film Connection
Ọ na-ahazi mmemme ihe nkiri. Shafik abụwo onye ntụgharị maka telivishọn German.
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi ọmụmụ nke MENA (Middle Eastern na North African) Programme Documentary Campus, atụmatụ nke na-elekwasị anya na iduzi na imepụta ihe nkiri na mba Middle East na North Africa.
